Keywords: Arkham Asylum , Detective , Gotham City Underworld , Legion of Doom
Real Name: Edward Nygma
Special Powers
RIDDLE ME THIS: Perplex, but can be used regardless of line of fire. When The Riddler uses it to target an opposing character, after resolutions give that character a Puzzled token.
WAS THAT ONE TOO HARD FOR YOUR ROOM-TEMPERATURE IQ?: When an opposing character within range with a Puzzled token would be targeted by Perplex, roll a d6.
1: Remove all Puzzled token from that character.
2-4: Gain 1 MISSION POINT for each Puzzled token on that character.
5-6:The use of Perplex has no effect and gain 1 MISSION POINT for each Puzzled token on that character.
